subject: Golf
PGA Championship
Grass
lead_paragraph: Three heat-resistant grasses were used in Rees Jones’s course redesign of the Highlands course at Atlanta Athletic Club, host of the 93rd P.G.A. Championship.
snippet: Three heat-resistant grasses were used in Rees Jones’s course redesign of the Highlands course at Atlanta Athletic Club, host of the 93rd P.G.A. Championship.
